typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Id as string,
		Male as string,
		Female as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> population
population unpivot(output(
		Gender as string,
		Count as integer
	),
	ungroupBy(Id),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
